author: jacopoc
msg: Improved code that manages the cache:
* protected the UtilCache object (static field) by making it private and final

* refactored code to be more inline with best practices for thread safefy: removed the method readNotificationGroups() (that was only used by the same class in one place) that was called with a lock held and inlined its logic into the colling method; this simplifies thecode and its readability

author: ard
msg: OCM-55 replace all commons logging code by slf4j code

author: cframpton
msg: Merge Flex changes to velocity with Velocity 1.4 (http://archive.apache.org/dist/velocity/engine/1.4/velocity-1.4.tar.gz) in preparation for forking and changing the package name.

author: vhennebert
msg: setBFEntries is deprecated, replaced with setCMap
